featured.text: The preceding passage refers to the word 'hacking' in the context of (A) climbing Mount Everest. (B) a game for young individuals.

definition.zh_def: 非法侵入計算機系統或網絡以獲取信息或造成損害的行為。
definition.en_def: The act of illegally accessing computer systems or networks to obtain information or cause damage.
definition.example: Hacking into secure databases can lead to serious legal consequences.
